SPA.title: Detox Body Wrap
SPA.description: A wrap with detoxifying ingredients to cleanse the skin.

SPA.title: Body Scrub
SPA.description: Exfoliation with salt, sugar, or coffee to remove dead skin and soften the body.

SPA.title: Cryotherapy
SPA.description: Short exposure to extreme cold to reduce inflammation and boost energy.

SPA.title: Steam Room Session
SPA.description: Heat therapy to detoxify, relax muscles, and improve circulation.

SPA.title: Crystal Sound Bath Therapy
SPA.description: Lie back as quartz singing bowls emit soothing frequencies, releasing stress and balancing energy.

MASSAGE.title: Swedish Massage
MASSAGE.description: Uses long strokes, kneading, and circular movements to ease muscle tension and improve circulation.

MASSAGE.title: Deep Tissue Massage
MASSAGE.description: Focuses on deeper muscle layers and connective tissue to relieve severe knots and stiffness.

MASSAGE.title: Hot Stone Massage
MASSAGE.description: Incorporates heated basalt stones placed on key points to melt away tension and enhance blood flow.

MASSAGE.title: Aromatherapy Massage
MASSAGE.description: Custom-blended oils (like lavender or eucalyptus) boost relaxation, mood, and skin health during the massage.

MASSAGE.title: Sports Massage
MASSAGE.description: Focuses on preventing/treating injuries, improving flexibility, and enhancing athletic performance through targeted techniques.

SKIN.title: HydraFacial
SKIN.description: Combines cleansing, exfoliation, extraction, hydration, and antioxidant protection for instant glow.

SKIN.title: LED Light Therapy
SKIN.description: Uses colored light (blue for acne, red for wrinkles) to stimulate collagen and kill bacteria without downtime.

SKIN.title: Microdermabrasion
SKIN.description: A diamond-tip wand removes dead cells, reducing fine lines, acne scars, and sun damage.

SKIN.title: Chemical Peel
SKIN.description: Applies AHA/BHA solutions to peel away dull layers, revealing brighter skin (mild to strong options available).

SKIN.title: Oxygen Facial
SKIN.description: Pressurized oxygen delivers vitamins and hyaluronic acid to plump, hydrate, and revive tired skin.
